text: Almond milk is a type of plant milk. It is made by blending almonds with water and optional flavors. Sometimes, it is fortified with some micronutrients to make up for the lack of it. It has a creamy texture and a nutty flavor. It is known to be one of the biggest dairy milk alternatives with a global market value of about 5 billion USD. == References == Category:Almonds Category:Plant milks
title: Almond milk
